name: LynxSuperFederation
description: A Lynx that manages a group that puts the federation first.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Environment variables. Leave it as it is

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer

LOGS.description: Fill ur Channel ID in here

EVENT_LOGS.description: Event Logs Channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this Public. ex: '-100'

ERROR_LOGS.description: Error Logs Channel to note down important Bot errors events, make this Public/Private. ex: '-100'

TG_TOKEN.description: Go to Telegram and Take the token at @BotFather

TG_USERNAME.description: Fill ur Bot Username which from @BotFather

DEV_ID.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and would come and bother Masha support then keep the current ID's here at they are and add yours

SD_ID.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as SUDO Users

SUPPORT_ID.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as SUPPORT Users(GBAN Perms Only)

TIGERS_ID.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as TIGER Users

WHITELIST_ID.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as WHITELISTED - can't be banned with your bot

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your HEROKU Api Key, get from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account'
HEROKU_API_KEY.value: Check On Your Heroku Dashboard -> Settings

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: Your Postgres SQl Database, empty this field if you dont have one

ARQ_API.description: Go to Telegram and Get this from @ARQRobot

SPAMWATCH_API.description: Go to Telegram and Get one from @SpamWatchBot
